definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
(of a wife) to visit one's parental home
(of a wife) to return to her parental home/(fig.) to return to one's old place, job, school etc

sentences.english: Once my family knew the truth, they helped give me the strength to walk away from the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我娘家人了解真相后，给了我力量走出困境。

sentences.english: A: My wife has been gone for two weeks visiting her mother.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子回娘家已经两个星期了。

sentences.english: She may choose to use both her husband's last name and her last name, followed by her given name.
sentences.chinese: 她可以同时使用夫姓和娘家姓，然后接名字。

sentences.english: She was someone from my great-grandmother's side of the family, and lived in the country in a small county in northern Jiangsu.
sentences.chinese: 是曾祖母娘家人，在江苏北部一个小县份的乡下住着。

sentences.english: When a couple gets married, the bride's family usually pays for the reception.
sentences.chinese: 夫妻成婚时，新娘家凡是支付宴会费用。

sentences.english: My wife has been gone for two weeks visiting her mother.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子回娘家已经两个星期了。

sentences.english: Married women visit their side of the family.
sentences.chinese: 已婚妇女会回娘家拜访。

sentences.english: Sometime after midnight, the groom, accompanied by his many guests, proceeds to the house of the bride.
sentences.chinese: 午夜时分，新郎会由众多宾客簇拥着前去新娘家。

sentences.english: She can use her maiden name only for private purposes.
sentences.chinese: 她只能在私人场合使用自己娘家的姓氏。

sentences.english: Big sister dont feel well want to return to fetus, season so often tried to comfort.
sentences.chinese: 大妹感觉不舒服想回娘家安胎，季常只好尽力安慰。

sentences.english: Bin Laden's then-bodyguard claimed to have delivered the dowry.
sentences.chinese: 本拉登的前保镖则声称，他曾帮忙给新娘家寄过彩礼。

sentences.english: Dr. Post was a c, and his wife was from big money.
sentences.chinese: 波斯特博士是心脏病专家，他老婆娘家非常非常有钱。

sentences.english: She had escaped her husband and come home.
sentences.chinese: 她从夫家逃出，回了娘家。

sentences.english: I promised my wife I will take her to her folks' on Saturday。
sentences.chinese: 我答应周六带我老婆去她娘家的。

sentences.english: A girl has to be shy sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 一个姑娘家就是会脸红呀。

sentences.english: DanSi aram angry separated the home.
sentences.chinese: 丹丝兰生气的分开了娘家。

definition: (of a wife) to return to her parental home/(fig.) to return to one's old place, job, school etc
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
native place/place of origin/home state or region
wife of older male cousin via female line
